President-elect Biden urged Senate Republicans to finally pass a comprehensive COVID-relief bill like the HEROES Act.  Because our country deserves a COVID-relief bill that meets the needs of Americans.  Democrats will not stop fighting to help the American people in this crisis.
It is long past time for the Senate to pass the HEROES Act.

Judy Shelton is so unqualified that a former Republican aide said even calling her as a witness before the Senate was “beyond the pale.”   Now Republicans want to actually put her on the Fed itself.   Democrats are fighting this terrible Trump nomination to the Fed.

Judy Shelton’s views are extreme and retrograde.  She seems to prefer the economic policies that led to the Great Depression.  She has openly advocated to a return to the gold standard.  Democrats are fighting this terrible Trump nomination to the Federal Reserve Board.

The truth is:  This nomination is part of a decades-long effort to tilt the courts towards the right to accomplish through the courts what Republicans could never accomplish through Congress  Democrats will never stop fighting for Americans’ health care and rights and freedoms

A warming planet. Workers falling behind. Dark money flooding politics. The curtailing of the right to choose. The limiting of voting rights.  Those are the consequences of this nomination.  We will never not stop fighting for the health care lives and freedoms of Americans.

It is a lie that Senate Republicans are merely following their own standard.  What is the real reason Republicans are so desperate?  President Trump vowed to only pick justices who would “terminate” our health care law.  Democrats will never not stop fighting for health care.

Senate Republicans are breaking 231 years of precedent and becoming the first majority to confirm a Supreme Court Justice this close to a presidential election day.  Democrats will never stop fighting for Americans’ health care rights and freedoms.

Today will go down as one of the darkest days in the Senate's 231-year history  The Senate GOP is thwarting the will of the people and confirming a lifetime appointment to the Supreme Court in the middle of a presidential election  Democrats will never stop fighting for Americans
I just forced a vote to adjourn the Senate until after the November election.  But the Senate Republicans voted to ignore—to laugh at—the wishes of the American people.  We won't stop fighting.

I’m taking to the floor to force another vote to adjourn the Senate until after the election.  Election day is in 8 days.  More than 60 million Americans have already voted.  But the Republicans are using a sham process to jam through President Trump’s nominee.

We are fighting for American lives and American freedoms  The right to affordable health care  The right to make your own private medical decisions  The right to join a union  The right to vote without impediments  The right to love  We will not stop fighting  #WhatsAtStake

If qualifications were the only thing that mattered—President Trump would not have vowed to only pick justices who would “terminate” our health care law  Democrats will not stop fighting for health care  Democrats will not stop fighting for Americans with pre-existing conditions
It's October 26th and President Trump still doesn’t have an adequate national testing strategy.

Vice President Pence cannot come to the Senate because of his exposure to multiple COVID-positive staffers. His purely ceremonial and non-essential presence would just put Senators staff and Capitol workers at risk.

We’re fighting for American lives and freedoms.  The right to affordable health care.  To make your own private medical decisions.  To join a union.  To vote without impediments.  To love.  We will not stop fighting.

The White House Chief of Staff said that they're “not going to control the pandemic”  But Republicans are still rushing their sham process for Pres. Trump’s nominee to rip away health care from millions amid COVID  Democrats will not stop fighting for Americans in this pandemic

If qualifications are the only thing that matter President Trump wouldn’t have said that if he gets to appoint two or three justices to the Supreme Court Roe v. Wade would be overturned “automatically”.  Democrats will not stop fighting for the right to choose.
Senate Democrats are taking over the floor all night to fight this sham process by Senate Republicans.  We will not stop fighting.

If qualifications are the only thing that matter President Trump wouldn’t have vowed to only pick justices who would “terminate” our health care law.  Democrats will not stop fighting for Americans’ health care.

Saturday—Senate GOP objects to helping Americans amid COVID  Last night—VP aides test positive. I wish them well but they said he'd keep campaigning & come to Senate.  Today—WH Chief says they're "not going to control the pandemic”  GOP's ignoring COVID to rush this sham process

Watch Live: I’m holding a digital rally with @ElizabethBanks on #WhatsAtStake on fighting for Americans’ health care and on fighting this sham Supreme Court nomination process from Senate Republicans. https://t.co/TNZ7w7XGWG

At 5pm ET today I’m holding a digital rally with @ElizabethBanks on fighting for #WhatsAtStake for Americans’ health care and on fighting this sham Supreme Court nomination process from Senate Republicans.  Tune in right here at @SenSchumer. https://t.co/G83gENB61n

Don’t tell me the issues don’t matter only qualifications.  We’re talking about American lives and freedoms.  The right to affordable health care.  To make your own private medical decisions.  To join a union.  To vote without impediments.  To love.  We will not stop fighting.

If qualifications are all that matter why did they block President Obama’s nominee?  If qualifications are all that matter why did President Trump vow to only pick justices who would “terminate” our health care law?  Democrats will not stop fighting for Americans' health care.

We took over the Senate floor today to demand action on 25 different bills to help Americans in need across this country  But the Senate GOP objected and objected and objected and objected  They just wanted to keep pushing through their sham process for President Trump’s nominee
Senator Whitehouse took to the floor to demand the Senate pass a resolution condemning how the courts have been captured by dark money efforts.  Senate Republicans objected.

Sen Blumenthal demanded: —Enhanced Background Checks —Paycheck Fairness —Forced Arbitration Injustice Repeal —Domestic Violence Survivor Protection —Veterans’ Access to Child Care —Securing America’s Federal Elections —Congressional Budget Justification Transparency  GOP objected

Democrats just demanded action on Danny’s Law to help fight bullying.  It was named for Daniel Fitzpatrick from New York City. He was 13 when he took his own life as a direct result of bullying.  But Senate Republicans objected. We won’t stop fighting.

We just forced floor action on a bill to protect Americans with pre-existing conditions  But the Senate GOP objected so that they can keep up their campaign to force President Trump’s nominee through a sham process to rip away protections for pre-existing conditions from millions

Sen. Brown demanded —Protecting Americans w/ Preexisting Conditions —Protecting Older Workers Against Discrimination —BRIDGE for Workers —Danny’s Law —Tribal Access to Homeless Assistance —Improving Corporate Governance Through Diversity  GOP objected to keep their sham process

I just demanded we act on: —For the People Act —Suicide Prevention Act —Family Support Services for Addiction Act —Effective Suicide Screening & Assessment in the Emergency Dept Act —Campaign to Prevent Suicide Act  GOP objected so they can keep pushing their illegitimate process

Sen. Durbin took to the floor to demand action on —American Dream & Promise Act —SHIELD Act —Maternal Health Quality Improvement Act —Helping MOMS Act —Violence Against Women Reauthorization Act  GOP objected so they can keep pushing their illegitimate process for Trump's nominee
